description:
I guarantee that each student will at least get 1 new client from using the techniques from this course without paying any money for advertising.

No matter if you have just started in the wedding industry or are a veteran, this course will give you new tricks and hacks to put in your marketing arsenal. You will learn about how to effectively:

  • Use Google scrape potential emails from brides waiting to buy from you.
  • Use Facebook as an ultimate free directory to contact potential brides.
  • Automate your Social Media
  • Increase Google Rankings

A Powerful Skill at Your Fingertips

As a wedding professional myself, when I first got started, I didn't have money to advertise. I had to think outside of the box and find ways to get clients. I discovered that the internet was a powerful tool and this course is going to increase your changes of making more sales.

Content and Overview

This course is going to teach you hacks on how to get more wedding clients without paying for advertising.

First, I will teach you tricks on social media that will:

  • Increase engagement.
  • Increase traffic to your website.
  • Give you more time to work on your craft.

Next, I will teach you how to get more leads from Wedding Wire and the The Knot without paying for their premium subscription.

Then, I will teach you how to use Facebook to find brides that you can message your services.

Finally, I will teach you on increase your google rankings by using the following factors:

  • Social
  • Local Citations
  • On Page Optimization
  • Backlinks

What am I going to get from this course?

I guarantee that each student will at least get 1 new client from using the techniques from this course without paying any money for advertising.
title: Internet Marketing: Wedding Business Edition
